introduction.title: Our Privacy Policy
introduction.content: Your privacy is important to us. Game of Stones operates as a completely open platform where users can play games directly without providing any personal information or data. We are committed to protecting your privacy by maintaining a zero-data collection policy.

section1.title: 1. INTRODUCTION
section1.content: This Privacy Policy explains the privacy practices of Game of Stones ("Platform"), operated by ARSHYA INFO SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED ("Company," "we," "our," or "us"). Our platform allows users to play games directly without registration, login, or providing any personal information. We maintain a strict no-data policy.

section2.title: 2. ZERO DATA COLLECTION POLICY
section2.content1: 2.1. Our platform operates with complete user anonymity - no registration or personal information is required.
section2.content2: 2.2. Users can access and play all games directly without providing names, email addresses, phone numbers, or any other personal details.
section2.content3: 2.3. No user accounts, profiles, or personal data storage of any kind exists on our platform.
section2.content4: 2.4. All gaming is completely anonymous with no digital footprint or stored records.

section3.title: 3. ANONYMOUS GAMING EXPERIENCE
section3.content1: 3.1. Our platform provides a completely anonymous gaming experience:
section3.bullet1: Direct game access without any registration or login process.
section3.bullet2: No user identification, tracking, or profiling of any kind.
section3.bullet3: Completely anonymous gameplay with no data collection or storage.
section3.bullet4: No marketing communications as we have no contact information to store.
section3.bullet5: No user analytics, behavior tracking, or performance monitoring that involves personal data.

section4.title: 4. NO TRANSACTIONS OR FINANCIAL DATA
section4.content1: 4.1. Currently, our platform operates without any financial transactions or monetary exchanges.
section4.bullet1: No payment processing, billing information, or financial data collection.
section4.bullet2: No stored payment methods, transaction histories, or financial records.
section4.bullet3: No tax-related data collection as there are no monetary transactions.
section4.content2: 4.2. Games are provided free of charge without any financial commitments or data requirements.
section4.content3: 4.3. No third-party payment processors or financial service integrations are currently implemented.

section5.title: 5. USER RIGHTS IN AN ANONYMOUS SYSTEM
section5.content1: Since our platform operates completely anonymously without any data collection:
section5.content2: No personal accounts or profiles exist that could require updates or modifications.
section5.content3: No communication preferences exist as we do not collect contact information.
section5.content4: No stored data exists that could be accessed, modified, or deleted.

section6.title: 6. CONTACT INFORMATION
section6.content: For any privacy-related queries or general platform inquiries, you may contact:
section6.address: Address: 032, 4th Floor, EMERALD PLAZA, Sector 65, Gurugram, Haryana 122018

section1.title: 1. INTRODUCTION
section1.content: Welcome to Game of Stones ("Platform"), operated by ARSHYA INFO SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED ("Company," "we," "our," or "us"). These Terms & Conditions ("Agreement") govern the use of our services and participation in contests available on the Platform. By accessing or using the Platform, you ("User," "you," or "your") agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the Platform.

section2.title: 2. USER ELIGIBILITY & REGISTRATION
section2.content: Users must be at least 18 years of age to participate. By registering, the User confirms meeting this requirement. Registration requires a valid mobile number, which may be verified by the Company. Users may voluntarily provide additional details such as gender and age after login. The User is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of account credentials and any activities conducted under the account.

section3.title: 3. RESPONSIBLE GAMING & FAIR PLAY
section3.content: The Platform promotes responsible gaming and encourages a balanced approach to online gameplay while discouraging addiction. Users are prohibited from creating or operating multiple accounts. The Company reserves the right to suspend, restrict, or terminate accounts involved in fraudulent, manipulative, or unfair practices, including but not limited to the use of automated scripts, bots, or third-party tools, collusion with other users, and misrepresentation or identity fraud. The Company may conduct audits or investigations into suspected violations.

section4.title: 4. LIABILITY & DISCLAIMERS
section4.content: The Platform is provided on an "as-is" and "as-available" basis, and the Company makes no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding uninterrupted access, error-free performance, or guarantee of winnings. The Company is not responsible for technical failures such as server downtime, connectivity issues, or software malfunctions, unauthorized access resulting from user negligence, or third-party disruptions affecting contest participation or transactions. Users participate at their own risk, and the Company disclaims any liability for financial losses incurred during gameplay.

section5.title: 5. GOVERNING LAW & DISPUTE RESOLUTION
section5.content: This Agreement is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from or related to these Terms & Conditions shall be resolved through binding arbitration in Gurugram, Haryana, under the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996. The arbitrator's decision shall be final and binding on both parties. Users waive the right to participate in any class-action lawsuit against the Company.

section6.title: 6. AMENDMENTS & MODIFICATIONS
section6.content: The Company reserves the right to update, modify, or amend these Terms & Conditions at its sole discretion. Any changes will be communicated through the Platform, and continued use of the services implies acceptance of the revised terms. Users are encouraged to review these Terms & Conditions periodically to stay informed.

section7.title: 7. CONTACT INFORMATION
section7.content: For any queries, grievances, or support requests, users may contact us at:
section7.address: Address: 031, 4th Floor, EMERALD PLAZA, Sector 65, Gurugram, Haryana 122018

game.question: Question
game.gameOfStonesDescription: Game of stones is a fun and competitive quiz game where players can test their knowledge and win exciting prizes!
game.gameOfStonesExtendedDescription: Join thousands of players in this thrilling quiz adventure! Answer questions across various categories including science, history, sports, entertainment, and general knowledge. Each correct answer earns you valuable stones that can lead to amazing rewards.
game.multipleGameModes: Multiple game modes: Jackpot, Fastest Finger, and Rapid Fire
game.gameOfStonesConclusion: Whether you're a trivia expert or just starting out, Game of Stones offers an engaging experience for all knowledge levels. Challenge yourself, climb the leaderboards, and become the ultimate quiz champion!
